title: Estimated decrease of GDP in Japan due to earthquake and tsunami 2011
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Decrease in billion euros for 6 number of Category Of Gdps.
The maximum Decrease in billion euros 70.0 is found at Category Of Gdp Total and the minimum is found at Exports where Category Of Gdp is 1.4.
Category Of Gdp Exports has 50.0 times less Decrease in billion euros than Category Of Gdp Total which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Decrease in billion euros for 6 number of Category Of Gdps.
The Decrease in billion euros is highest at Category Of Gdp Total and lowest at Category Of Gdp Exports.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Decrease in billion euros for 6 number of Category Of Gdps.
The maximum Decrease in billion euros 70.0 is found at Category Of Gdp Total and the minimum is found at Exports where Category Of Gdp is 1.4.
Category Of Gdp Exports has 50.0 times less Decrease in billion euros than Category Of Gdp Total which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Decrease in billion euros for 6 number of Category Of Gdps.
The Decrease in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Category Of Gdp Total and lowest at Category Of Gdp Exports.
Second maximum Decrease in billion euros is found at Category Of Gdp Production.
The difference of Decrease in billion euros between the highest and lowest Category Of Gdp is 68.6.
Decrease in billion euros at Category Of Gdp Total is 70.0 , second place is Production at 45.4, and thirdly is Private consumption at 18.2.
The lowest value 1.4 at Exports is almost 3.01 times smaller than the average value 23.28.
